description: This creamy and delicious chicken dish is a simple and quick midweek dinner option.
name: Apple, Mustard & Cider Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.8 cup chicken stock, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large nonstick pan on medium heat and cook the chicken pieces for 3-4 minutes to seal on all sides and brown slightly. Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Add the leeks to the pan and cook for 5 minutes, stir in the apples and garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Pour in the cider and leave to bubble for 1 minute, then add the chicken stock.
Reduce the heat to medium low, return the chicken to the pan, cook for 810 minutes with the lid on. Stir in the creme fraiche and mustard and cook for 2-3 minutes. Serve with potatoes or rice.
